title: Counter-Strike: Source 3029837 (v86) No-Steam
description:
Year: 2015
Genre: Action
Developer: Valve Corporation
Publisher: Valve

System Requirements:
Minimum: 1.7 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM, DirectX 8.1 level Graphics Card (Requires support for SSE), Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection
Recommended: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better), 1GB RAM, DirectX 9 level Graphics Card, Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Language: English, French, German, Russian, Spanish
Sound language: English, Russian

Overview: Counter-Strike: Source (also known as CS or simply CS:S) is a multiplayer, team-based tactical first-person shooter video game, developed by Valve and Turtle Rock Studios. It is a remake of Counter-Strike, the 1999 modification of Half-Life. Built on the Source engine, the game was released in 2004 along with Half-Life 2. The game is the most played Half-Life 2 mod, according to GameSpy.

As in the original version, Counter-Strike: Source games pit a team of counter-terrorists against a team of terrorists in a series of rounds. Each round is won by either completing a mission (such as detonating a bomb or rescuing hostages) or by eliminating all members of the opposing team. Unlike Half-Life: Source, the game is a complete remake instead of a port with additional content.

Features of distribution:
- Do not cut and not recoded
- Based on the license
- Version of the game: 3029837 (v86)
- Emulator RevEmu updated to the latest version
- Installation time: 5 minutes.

Installation and start:
1. Run the file Counter-Strike Source 3029837 (v86).exe
2. Follow the installer instructions
3. Run the file css_autoupdater.exe in the game folder, click check
4. Press "ÐŸÐ¾ÐµÑ…Ð°Ð»Ð¸" to start the game.
